rule.name: AS_QNM_UT_calculateQuestionRequiredAndValidMetadata
rule.description: Rule used to calculate the required and valid metadata for a question and its fields
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!questionMetadata: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_QuestionMetadata'( questionId: ri!question.questionId, showWhen: ri!questionMetadata.showWhen, required: if( ri!questionMetadata.showWhen, #"_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_31411"( question: ri!question, applicableQuestions: ri!applicableQuestions, applicableQuestionsMetadata: ri!applicableQuestionsMetadata, fieldKey: null ), false ), fieldMetadata: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: ri!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata, expression: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:QNM}AS_QNM_FieldMetadata'( fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey, showWhen: fv!item.showWhen, required: if( fv!item.showWhen, #"_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_31411"( question: ri!question, applicableQuestions: ri!applicableQuestions, applicableQuestionsMetadata: ri!applicableQuestionsMetadata, fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey ), false ), valid: if( fv!item.showWhen, #"_a-0000e460-9d93-8000-9bc1-011c48011c48_595671"( question: ri!question, fieldKey: fv!item.fieldKey ), null ) ) ) ), if( ri!questionMetadata.showWhen, #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_260165"( cdt: local!questionMetadata, fields: "valid", newValues: and( local!questionMetadata.fieldMetadata.valid ) ), local!questionMetadata ) )
